text: [Applause]
thank you
hello my name is Jamel Daniels as you
can see there are so many reasons why I
love my HBCU I'm an Ohio native and
resident of Harlem New York I'm also a
laude graduate of the North Carolina
a T State University Aggie Pride my
degree is in Design and Merchandising
and has helped me achieve my dreams by
being able to work as a designer in the
apparel industry for top companies and
give back at the same time I'm also the
founder and designer of black college
Union and through my brand we give away
two book scholarships each semester to
deserving students even though I haven't
finished paying off my student loans yet
if I'm the recipient of this TBS HBCU
Cash Out scholarship I can guarantee you
I will pay it forward to the next
generation of HBCU students
